title: Snapchat now lets you share videos directly from the YouTube app
content:
Snapchat on Thursday announced a new feature for iOS and Android users that lets you share videos directly from the YouTube app instead of having to manually copy and paste the link. As a result, users will get a custom YouTube sticker with a video thumbnail instead of a simple URL.

moreâ€¦

The post Snapchat now lets you share videos directly from the YouTube app appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Instead of having to manually copy and paste a YouTube link, Snapchat users can now share videos directly from the YouTube app.
